<title level="1" right="Trait">[Soulbound](/Traits.aspx?ID=773)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 363 <sup>1.1</sup>

These constructs are mentally augmented by a fragment of a once-living creature's soul.
name: Soulbound
